body:
Hello my Avicus friends and Co-workers!

I challenge all of you to join a Nexus game and record your self killing as many people as possible using only your fist! Its an extremely fun challenge and I encourage all of you to do it yourselves!

title: [CHALLENGE] FIST CHALLENGE
